My name is José Roberto Chávez Cobián . I am a developer currently located in Guadalajara, México. I am passionate about my job and want to continue learning and growing at it.

I gratuated from the University of Colima as a Software Engineer. Currently working as a web developer.

I've created this site as a personal project using what I've learn as a web developer. It will be continue growing full other side-projects along the way.

I was born in Cd. Guzmán, Jalisco. A small city contained within a valley of mountains and a couple of volcanoes.

I moved to Colima and graduated in Software Engineering. After that, I moved to Guadalajara and started working as a Web Developer in front-end. I've learned and began mastering such technologies for two and a half years now. At the same time, I got certified in Java 8 to expand my knowledge and open new roads in the future.

Here I'll post some of the latest projects I have. Curently I'm working on a dynamic résumé so it can be public like this site. Along with that, for Java, I'm working on a CYOA game! You can check the status on its repository.

I'll post some of my latest pens as well, you can check all of them there.
